name: Runbble
description:
Runbble is... Well Runbble is Runbble.
But it's my first game !
You are a bear and you jump. You just jump by pressing the screen, but the longer you press, the higher you jump !

Jump further to beat your high score and get pieces to buy new skins and new background !

I lost the source code so I can't modify it, and i know there still some bugs so... It's just here to say "Hey I still have my first game and it's playable ! ".

If you want to see what I do now, go visit my itch.io page !
